Class AdminHomePage

java.lang.Object
application.AdminHomePage
public class AdminHomePage extends Object
AdminHomePage class represents the user interface for the admin user. This page displays a welcome message for the admin and provides admin functions including generating invitation codes, viewing users, and resetting the database. The UI is organized into sections for different administrative functions.

  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, DatabaseHelper databaseHelper, User user)
      Displays the admin page in the provided primary stage. This method creates and configures the entire admin interface with sections for invitation code generation, user management, role management, and database reset.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage where the scene will be displayed.
      databaseHelper - An instance of DatabaseHelper to handle database operations.
      user - The current user who has admin privileges.

    • refreshUserData

      private void refreshUserData(DatabaseHelper databaseHelper, javafx.scene.control.TableView<User> userTable, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> userSelector, String selectedUserName, javafx.scene.control.Label currentRolesLabel)
      Helper method to refresh the user data after role changes. Updates both the user table view and the current roles label for the selected user.
      Parameters:
      databaseHelper - The database helper instance for retrieving updated user data
      userTable - The table view to refresh with updated user data
      userSelector - The user dropdown to refresh
      selectedUserName - The currently selected username to focus after refresh
      currentRolesLabel - The label showing current roles to update with the latest roles
